hazma.phases_space_generator package¶

Submodules¶

hazma.phases_space_generator.rambo module¶

class hazma.phases_space_generator.rambo.Rambo¶

Bases: object

generate_energy_histogram()¶

Returns the energy probability distributions for each particle. These distributions are stored in (num_particles, 2, num_bins) array called probs. For example, probs[1, 0, :], probs[1, 1, :] are the energies and their probabilities, respectively, for the second particle.

Parameters:
  • num_phase_space_pts – Number of phase space ponp.ints to generate.
  • masses – List of the final state particle masses.
  • cme – Center of mass energy of the process.
  • num_bins – Number of bins to use for the probability distributions.
Returns:

Array containing the energy probability distributions for each final state particle. The shape is (len(masses), 2, num_bins)
Return type:

probs (np.ndarray)
generate_phase_space()¶

Creates ‘num_phase_space_pts’ number of phase space ponp.ints with final state particles with masses ‘masses’ and center of mass energy ‘cme’.

Parameters:
  • num_phase_space_pts – Number of phase space ponp.ints to generate.
  • masses – List of the final state particle masses.
  • cme – Center of mass energy of the process.
Returns:

Array containing the four momenta of each particles for each event. The shape is (num_phase_space_pts, len(masses), 4)

wieght_array (np.ndarray): Array containing the weight of each event. The shape is (num_phase_space_pts)
Return type:

phase_space_array (np.ndarray)
